column3: So this doesn't include the switch to Boost 1.52 and even doesn't rely on the static switches?\n

Test results, on a Windows XP SP3 virtual machine:

Memory usage:
  570MB peak during initial block download
  ~300MB typical usage during IBD
 ~200MB peak usage restarting fully synced
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/b1024662eafddd5560fbfbac29333e5e967ca0f8 for binaries and test log.\n
